sect2.title: Dependencies
sect2.para: Procps-&procps-depversion; needs the following to be installed:
sect2.literallayout: bash: sh binutils: as, ld, strip fileutils: install, ln, mv, rm gcc: cc1, collect2, cpp0, gcc grep: grep make: make mawk: awk sed: sed sh-utils: basename, pwd textutils: sort, tr
